org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.file

Class DefaultFileRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.common.file.DefaultFileRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileRepository

    public class DefaultFileRepository
extends Object
implements FileRepository
    Default implementation of FileRepository interface - files are stored in the file system.
    Author:
    Petr Juza

      • isFileIdValid

        public boolean isFileIdValid(String fileId)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Is specified file ID valid identifier? In other words is there file with specified identifier?
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        fileId - the file ID
        Returns:

      • commitFile

        public void commitFile(String fileId,
              String fileName,
              FileContentTypeExtEnum contentType,
              List<String> subFolders)
        Description copied from interface: FileRepository
        Commits saving file - the file will be moved from temporary folder to the target place. If there is already the file with the same name in the target folder then it's replaced by the new one.
        Specified by:
        commitFile in interface FileRepository
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file identifier from FileRepository.saveTempFile(OutputStreamWriterCallback)
        fileName - the original file name
        contentType - the file content type
        subFolders - the collection of sub-folders which determine where is the target folder for moving the file

      • getFileName

        protected String getFileName(String fileName,
                 FileContentTypeExtEnum contentType)
        Gets file name that the file will be saved with.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the original file name (also with extension)
        contentType - the content type
        Returns:
        file name

      • getNewFileId

        protected String getNewFileId()
